summary: This addes the lorefriendly Ka Po\'Tun Race from Akavir to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b74/Desert-Rat/Skyrim%20Mods/Banner.jpg[/IMG]

[b]Hi everyone[/b]

This addes the lorefriendly Ka Po\'Tun Race from Akavir to Skyrim.
The Stats are similar to the Khajiit
The Ka Po\'Tun are a bit larger then Nord (not much though)
Sneak:10
One-Handed:5
Two-Handed:5
Heavy Armor:5
Lockpicking:5
Block:5

[b]What is this Mod?[/b]

Lore:
\"The Ka Po\' Tun are a race of (tiger-like) \"cat-folk\" who live in the continent of Akavir. It is unknown to what extent they are similar or related to the Khajiit. The Ka Po\' Tun are one of four races who live in Akavir; the other races are the Kamal, Tang Mo, and Tsaesci. Although all of the races have fought each other at various times, the Ka Po\' Tun consider the Tsaesci to be their greatest enemies. They have recently allied themselves with the Tang Mo.\"

[b]How to install?[/b]

Just place the Texture Folder and the .esp into you Skyrim Data Folder


[b]How to uninstall this?[/b]

Just delete the Folders \"KaPoTun\" in your Texture/actor/character Folder and the KaPoTun.esp from your Data folder.


[b]Is it compatible with CBBE and similar Mods?[/b]

Yes you can use it with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE[/url] and other Mods like that. I didn\'t encountred any Bugs so far. If you find some, report them and i will fix them. ;) 
Nude Mods are not supported yet.


[b]Credits[/b]

You can upload the File on other Sites aslong you name me as creator of the Mod.
Also you can add this to your own Mod, just give some credits for the work.

Thanks to Behtesda for this cool Game!

If you have made Screenshots, feel free to post them here, so other People see how they look, also i am really interrested in your Character.

I hope you enjoy my Mods!

Have fun,
JazzJR

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2741960]Take a look at my other Mods.[/url]
Thanks for your time. Feel free to comment if you like my Mod or if you found any bugs, or things to improve.



[IMG]http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b74/Desert-Rat/Banner.jpg[/IMG]
author: JazzJR
